column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Excellent ramen and consistently prompt
column2: attentive service. We usually try to arrive before it gets loud and the line starts going out the door. The crispy chicken appetizer is excellent
column3: as is the carmelized cauliflower. I usually stick to the spicy umami tonkatsu ramen. It is very
column4: very flavorful but not so spicy that I can't eat it. I like to add an egg
column6: and extra noodles. It's very filling.
